This an introductory course and is designed for students who are new to the ProxySG solution.

The ProxySG Diagnostics and Troubleshooting course provides a structured approach to diagnosing and solving common troubleshooting issues related to ProxySG deployments. The course will emphasize handson experience, with extensive opportunities to build competency in the use of the powerful diagnostic tools available on the ProxySG.
